snippet: Goldman Sachs’s second-quarter profit doubles. | The Fabrice Tourre trial puts a spotlight on a tightknit network of legal players. | A new report suggests big banks’ high-minded words about ethics may largely be lip service. | Herbert M. Allison...
abstract: Goldman Sachs’s second-quarter profit doubles. | The Fabrice Tourre trial puts a spotlight on a tightknit network of legal players. | A new report suggests big banks’ high-minded words about ethics may largely be lip service. | Herbert M. Allison Jr., a former president of Merrill Lynch, dies at 69.
